channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Events Made Easy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Events Made Easy

item.title: CVE-2021-25030|2024-08-03T19:49:14.585Z -- unknown -- events%20made%20easy
item.description: The Events Made Easy WordPress plugin before 2.2.36 does not sanitise and escape the search_text parameter before using it in a SQL statement via the eme_searchmail AJAX action, available to any authenticated users. As a result, users with a role as low as subscriber can call it and perform SQL injection attacks

item.title: CVE-2022-1905|2024-08-03T00:17:00.944Z -- unknown -- events%20made%20easy
item.description: The Events Made Easy WordPress plugin before 2.2.81 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement via an AJAX action available to unauthenticated users, leading to a SQL injection

item.title: CVE-2021-24813|2024-08-03T19:42:17.348Z -- unknown -- events%20made%20easy
item.description: The Events Made Easy WordPress plugin before 2.2.24 does not sanitise and escape Custom Field Names, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
